fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.depressionaut

Class ScoreCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.depressionaut.ScoreCounter

  • public class ScoreCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    ScoreCounter class has methods for counting the score, adding multiplier and temporary buffs, drawing the score etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScoreCounter(MyGdxGame game) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void click()
      click() adds points to the main score and the wallet by multiplying the temporary multiplier (buffs and daily bonuses), the multiplier (which can be bought on the store) and the clickpower (which can also be upgraded from the store)
      boolean decrementWallet(float amount)
      Decrement the amount of money in the wallet by the given amount.
      float getClickPower()
      Get the click power amount.
      float getDailyBonus()
      returns dailybonus
      int getHappinessLevel()
      getHappinessLevel turns the score into happinesslevel
      float getMultiplier()
      Get the multiplier.
      float getPassiveIncome()
      Get the amount of passive income.
      java.lang.String getRationalizedScore()
      getRationalizedScore() rounds the score for when it gets printed to the UI
      float getScore()
      Get the score.
      int getScoreForNextLevel(int happinessLevel)
      returns the amount of score the player needs to get to get to the next level
      float getTempMultiplier()
      Get tempMultiplier.
      float getTotalClicks()
      Get the score.

      Get the amount of money in the wallet.

      Increment the amount of money in the wallet by the given amount.

      Set the click power amount.
      void setDailyBonus()
      if the player has gotten a daily bonus today, setDailyBonus will add a 2x multiplier for the day

        public void click()
        click() adds points to the main score and the wallet by multiplying the temporary multiplier (buffs and daily bonuses), the multiplier (which can be bought on the store) and the clickpower (which can also be upgraded from the store)

      • decrementWallet

        public boolean decrementWallet(float amount)
        Decrement the amount of money in the wallet by the given amount. Safeguards against the player not having enough funds.
        Parameters:
        amount - The decrement amount.
        Returns:
        boolean True on a successful withdrawal. False if not enough money.
